reviews.review: Counter strike 1.6 ou mais conhecido como cs 1.6 , é um jogo que ha varios anos vem proporcionando felicidade e alegria aos jogadores e por incrivel que pareça ainda ha milhares de jogadores....
童年补票 我觉得我不用介绍这个游戏了 03年火爆大街小巷的游戏
One of the best fps ever made <3
It was the best game ever <3 my childhood was the best

I don't know... Maybe if the hitboxes worked this would be great. Maybe if modelling was a little smoother (I know it's the GoldSrc engine but still). Maybe if some new people played it instead of really really good people who have played it for the last 18 years. I really have better things to play, but I just can't play this enough.
Ehrenspiel<3 guten alten zeiten aufm Ambrosia.
El peor bot es mejor que yo.
Old But Gold <3 best game ever .
um dos melhores fps de todos os tempos e um clássico no mundo dos games
Докатились до того что кс 1.6 стоит 24 рубля -_-
So much memories from my childhood, playing this game. All time classic, buy it without any doubt!
Imposible jugar, demasiados jugadores experimentados que elevan de una forma exagerada la curva de dificultad ademas de que a cada momento me cambia de servidor.
Добротная игра ! проверенная временем Рекомундую пока идет акция,!
gayet iyi bir oyun. eskiler aklıma gelince bi duygulandım.

I would recommend this game way before but we are now in the future of gaming and this game got aged to be left as a legend.

No longer recommend this as 90% of the servers are dead.
Это прям такой pleasantly, что аж classic!10/10

Ce jeu est... particulié. Fan de cs:go, je vois ce jeu: cs. Puis je regarde le prix: 0,99€ + cs: condition zero (il est à ce prix la moitié de l'année). Puis je craque. Au début, je pensais que ça allait être nul et bugué, et finallement, ce jeu est géniale, il y a encore une certaine communauté sans le stress des rageux de cs:go qui sont full compète. Je conseil vraiment ce jeu!
B 1 4 - B 4 2 - O 2 O 3 O 3 O4 O5  RUSH B
Eb tvau mat! Igra vashe krytaya!
Um clássico que nunca será esquecido.
Это лучшая гейма из всех существующих в природе бл*дь! Раунд!
Solid solid game one of my favourite games ever invented and still one of the most played ones to date!!!!
I love this game!! Is very nice game!

Mano não to comseguindo jogar me ajudem por favor.
Quando eu entro no jogo a tela fica rodando como se eu estivesse colocando o mouse para o lado, como eu arrumo isso?

Cs 1.6 это:
Простреллы черезь всю карту.
Толпы орущих школьников.
Это когда играешь ответственный матч и сливаешь, ибо твоих друзей позвала мама кушать.
Минимум читеров ( они все почти в CS:GO ).
Старые, добрые до боли знакомве карты.
Когда прострелил школьников, а они орут что ты читер.
10 орущих школьников из 10
One of those games that are so old, but super fun. It's quite a nostalgic game. Super old-school and fun! It's super cheap and fun. Total recommendation
Игру советую всем, каественнная хоть и 2000-ых годов.

I liked the game. No lag and it's pretty smooth. Overall I love it. The problem is, some players tend to have less fps on steam and more on non steam. Dunno why, but I definitely recommend this game even for adults and young ones
jogo nostalgico velhos tempos estao aq mas o jogo esta morrendo  :c
Я играл в нее с 6-ти лет. И вот в свои 19 руки дошли ее купить.
Muy divertido e interesante puedo divertirme con amigos y conocer otros nuevos.
The one that started it all.
